site_name: 1 Ashlar Court 21 Ravenscourt GardensLondonW6 0TU
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T1 2x lombardy poplar: reduce by approx 4m height. Regrowth breaking and falling on to neighbouring propertiesT2 Sycamore tree: pollard, removing approx 4m growth. Tree close to neighbouring properties, some stems breaking & falling onto itT3 Sycamores: crown reduce approx 2m. Excessive shading. Crown congested, branches breaking/fallingTG2 2 sycamores: crown reduce approx 2M. Excessive shading to adjacent buildings, light to surrounding vegetation is limitedT4 Maple: crown raised over road to 4M clearance, footpath 3.5m clearance.  Low hanging branches interfering with road & footpathT5 Maple: crown raise over road to 4m clearance, footpath 3.5m, reduce stems encroaching streetlampback for  0.75m clearance T6 Gingko tree: crown reduce approx 2M. Elongated stems beginning to break & fall. T7 Lime tree: fell & remove stump. Tree close to gingko tree (t6) and is heavily suppressed.
